facts.emailContent: A new auditing case has been assigned to you. case link

PROCESSTYPE.name: PaymentIntegrityAuditDemoV2
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
    <message name="injectListJSON" id="injectListJSON"/>
    <process isExecutable="true" name="PaymentIntegrityAuditDemoV2" id="PaymentIntegrityAuditDemoV2">
        <startEvent name="PaymentIntegrityAuditDemoV2" id="start"/>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask1" sourceRef="start" id="flow21"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_AssignAuditor_form" name="Assign Auditor" id="userTask1"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask1" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage22">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="MailTask2" sourceRef="userTask1" id="flow23"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:type="mail" id="MailTask2">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="to">
                    <activiti:expression>${assignedAuditor}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="from">
                    <activiti:expression>alert@point.io</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="cc">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_currentAssignee}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="subject">
                    <activiti:expression>${emailSubject}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="html">
                    <activiti:expression>${emailContent}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask3" sourceRef="MailTask2" id="flow24"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_AuditCase_form" name="Audit Case" id="userTask3"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask3" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage25">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="MailTask4" sourceRef="userTask3" id="flow26"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:type="mail" id="MailTask4">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="to">
                    <activiti:expression>${caseManager}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="from">
                    <activiti:expression>alert@point.io</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="cc">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_currentAssignee}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="subject">
                    <activiti:expression>${emailSubject}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="html">
                    <activiti:expression>${emailContent}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask5" sourceRef="MailTask4" id="flow27"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_ApproveFindings_form" name="Approve Findings" id="userTask5"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask5" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage28">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="MailTask6" sourceRef="userTask5" id="flow29"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:type="mail" id="MailTask6">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="to">
                    <activiti:expression>${providerContact}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="from">
                    <activiti:expression>alert@point.io</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="cc">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_currentAssignee}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="subject">
                    <activiti:expression>${emailSubject}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="html">
                    <activiti:expression>${emailContent}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask7" sourceRef="MailTask6" id="flow30"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_ReviewCaseAuditResults_form" name="Review Case Audit Results" id="userTask7"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask7" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage31">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway8" sourceRef="userTask7" id="flow32"/>
        <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway8"/>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask9" sourceRef="exclusivegateway8" id="flow33">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == "accept"}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="loadDocusign" id="serviceTask9">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_loadDocusign_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${READMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask10" sourceRef="serviceTask9" id="flow34"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_confirmResponse_form" name="confirmResponse" id="userTask10"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask10" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage35">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="snapshot12" sourceRef="userTask10" id="flow36"/>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="script11" sourceRef="exclusivegateway8" id="flow37">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == "dispute"}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <scriptTask id="script11" name="setup Question" scriptFormat="javascript" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>execution.setVariableLocal("${CaseResult}", "Start Dispute Case");</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="snapshot12" sourceRef="script11" id="flow38"/>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="snapshot12" sourceRef="exclusivegateway8" id="flow39"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.SnapShot" name="List Objects" id="snapshot12">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="recordType">
                    <activiti:string>snapshot12</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="snapshot12" id="flow40"/>
        <endEvent name="end" id="end"/>
    </process>
</definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.name: Docusign Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
  <process id="io.point.Docusign_provider" name="Docusign Fact Provider Flow" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"/>
    <serviceTask id="task3" name="Sign" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_Read_Obj_toFields">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow1" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End"/>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway" default="default"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow14" name="GET" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="task3">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow17" sourceRef="task3" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="default" name="Unsupported" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Default" activiti:formKey="poi_default_view"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask1" name="OAuth2" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="username">
          <activiti:expression>${username}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="password">
          <activiti:expression>${password}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow18" name="OAuth" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask1">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "PUT"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow19" sourceRef="servicetask1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask2" name="List Objects" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_List_Objs">
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow20" name="GETOBJS" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask2">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GETOBJS"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow21" sourceRef="servicetask2" targetRef="endevent1"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="io.point.Docusign_provider" id="BPMNPlane_io.point.Docusign_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="70.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task3" id="BPMNShape_task3">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="30.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="740.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="150.0" y="161.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="320.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="servicetask1" id="BPMNShape_servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="100.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="servicetask2" id="BPMNShape_servicetask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="210.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow1" id="BPMNEdge_flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="105.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="150.0" y="181.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow14" id="BPMNEdge_flow14">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="161.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="334.0" y="57.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="23.0" x="179.0" y="41.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow17" id="BPMNEdge_flow17">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="439.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="default" id="BPMNEdge_default">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="190.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="740.0" y="181.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="63.0" x="209.0" y="164.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow18" id="BPMNEdge_flow18">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="161.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="334.0" y="127.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="31.0" x="173.0" y="115.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow19" id="BPMNEdge_flow19">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="439.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow20" id="BPMNEdge_flow20">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="201.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="237.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="334.0" y="237.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="100.0" x="179.0" y="239.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow21" id="BPMNEdge_flow21">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="439.0" y="237.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="237.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="199.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
